queries.query: SELECT t.name, t.create_date, t.modify_date, t.max_column_id_used, text_in_row_limit, t.lock_escalation_desc, i.type_desc as table_type, i.fill_factor, ps.alloc_unit_type_desc, ps.avg_fragmentation_in_percent, ps.avg_record_size_in_bytes, ps.page_count, ps.forwarded_record_count FROM sys.tables t JOIN sys.indexes i ON t.object_id = i.object_id AND i.index_id < 2 CROSS APPLY sys.dm_db_index_physical_stats(DB_ID(), t.object_id, i.index_id, NULL, 'LIMITED') as ps WHERE ps.page_count > 10 ORDER BY t.name;
